price: Kisha watarudishwa kwa Mwenyezi Mungu, Mola wao wa Haki. Hakika, hukumu ni yake. Naye ni Mwepesi kuliko wote wanao hisabu.
arabic: ثُمَّ رُدُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَوۡلَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ أَلَا لَهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمُ وَهُوَ أَسۡرَعُ ٱلۡحَٰسِبِينَ
footnotes: Tena hawa maiti watafufuliwa Siku ya Kiyama, na watasimamishwa mbele ya Mola Mlezi wao ambaye ndiye anayatawala mambo yao peke yake. Jueni kuwa Yeye tu ndiye wa kuamua baina ya viumbe na kuwahisabu katika Siku hiyo, naye ni Mwepesi wa kuhisabu na kulipa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: thumma ruddū ilā al-lahi mawlāhumu al-ḥaqi alā lahu al-ḥuk'mu wahuwa asraʿu al-ḥāsibīna
